sentences.en: A point of order was raised in parliament by Mr Ben Morris.
sentences.cn: 本·莫里斯先生在议会就程序问题提出质询。

sentences.en: Asked what English he knew, Mr Semko rattled off "One, two, three"
sentences.cn: 问他懂哪些英文词，塞姆科先生不假思索地回答：“一，二，三。”

sentences.en: He called Mr Mandela a hero who had inspired millions.
sentences.cn: 他称曼德拉先生为鼓舞了数百万民众的英雄。

sentences.en: I wonder if I might have a word with Mr Abbot?
sentences.cn: 请问我能否和阿博特先生说几句话？

sentences.en: Mr Abel's doctor has said he is unfit to travel.
sentences.cn: 埃布尔先生的医生说他不宜出行。

sentences.en: Mr Brown and his wife corresponded for many years before they met.
sentences.cn: 布朗先生与妻子在相识以前先通信了好多年。

sentences.en: Mr Collier heaved a sigh and got to his feet.
sentences.cn: 科利尔先生深叹一口气，站了起来。

sentences.en: Mr Dudley has pledged to give any award to charity.
sentences.cn: 达德利先生已承诺将任何所获的损害赔偿额都捐给慈善机构。

sentences.en: Mr Mandela was given a tumultuous reception in Washington.
sentences.cn: 曼德拉先生在华盛顿受到热情的款待。

sentences.en: Mr Martin was taken out of his car at gunpoint.
sentences.cn: 马丁先生被人用枪指着从车里带了出来。

sentences.en: Mr Morris feels the museum is using advertising to good effect.
sentences.cn: 莫里斯先生认为博物馆作的广告卓有成效。

sentences.en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentences.cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

sentences.en: Mr Thomas was taught by the Catholic nuns whose school he attended.
sentences.cn: 托马斯先生是在天主教修女创办的学校接受的教育。

sentences.en: Mr White likes chatting up the girls.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生喜欢跟姑娘们搭讪。

sentences.en: She met Mr and Mrs Ricciardi, who were very nice to her.
sentences.cn: 她见到了里恰尔迪夫妇，他们对她非常友好。

sentences.en: The governors were joined by Mr Hunter and his management team.
sentences.cn: 亨特先生及他率领的管理小组加入了州长们的队伍。

sentences.en: This gave Mr White an opportunity of collecting his thoughts.
sentences.cn: 这就给怀特先生一个使思想集中起来的机会。

sentences.en: Under these laws, he said, Mr. Rice's assets could have been frozen.
sentences.cn: 他说根据这些法规，赖斯先生的资产可能已经被冻结了。

phrases.tran_cn: 白马王子；如意郎君；对先生；理想的丈夫

trans.tran_cn: Mister 先生，Master 少爷，Mother 母亲，molecular radius 分子半径
